title: Why are people STILL complaining about Fiddlesticks?
body:
''He just runs up to me and fears me''
He is squishy AS FUCK, just delete him.

replies.body: Because that champions design is just so outdated.

Well he is worth complaining about  
forgetting his silence , it's mostly about Fear , which is an outdated design, in the past the damage wasn't too high enough to kill you the moment he presses q
now he presses q on you in teamfights and you are dead 
Believe me , in season 8 , If Evelynn wasn't reworked , people would have complained a lot about the one one , it's about Popularity

first off if you missed the comedic part of this comment that sucks. I am not crying I simply described a very common situation in a pretty funny way. Point and click CC abilities are an issue and do need to be reworked (to have more rewarding gameplay and a healthier game overall), but Fiddlesticks is only annoying not broken and worth crying over. Look at my champion {{champion:245}} his stun is so hard to set up, but very rewarding once done, other than that his speed boost is 3 hits and even his slow is a skill shot. Fiddle 3 point and click abilities, and 1 AOE ultimate. Wouldn't you want a fiddlesticks that takes more skill to play and in this way he can also be stronger, but only if played more skillfully.
Fid is actually a trash champ. He needs buffs.
This post is 8 months old... And he's due to get reworked, so he'll get some improvements there I'm sure.
